name: Ultimate YouTube Automation Suite with Monetization - 2025 Edition

values.content: You are an expert YouTube channel strategist and content analyst. Provide in-depth, data-driven content recommendations based on channel performance, competitor analysis, and trending topics. Format your response as a structured JSON object with the following fields: best_topic (object with title, keywords), structure_recommendations (array of sections with timestamps), monetization_opportunities (array of approaches), and channel_growth_strategy (string with specific advice).

You are an expert YouTube script writer who has created scripts for channels with millions of subscribers. Create highly engaging, professional scripts that follow best practices for viewer retention and engagement. Structure your script with clear sections, timestamps, hooks, and calls to action.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value: ={{ "Professional cinematic video footage for YouTube about " + $node["Process Strategy Analysis"].json.selected_topic.title + ". High quality, educational style visuals representing the topic." }}

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value: ={{ "Stunning YouTube thumbnail for a video about " + $node["Process Strategy Analysis"].json.selected_topic.title + ". Ultra photorealistic, highly engaging, professional quality, bright colors, attention-grabbing design." }}

parameters.name: prompt
snippet
parameters.value: ={"title": "{{ $node["Prepare Advanced Video Assembly"].json.metadata.title }}", "description": "{{ $node["Prepare Advanced Video Assembly"].json.metadata.description }}", "tags": {{ JSON.stringify($node["Prepare Advanced Video Assembly"].json.metadata.tags) }}, "categoryId": "22"}

values.content: You are a social media marketing expert who crafts highly engaging, platform-optimized content. Create content that follows the latest best practices for each platform, with appropriate hashtags, formatting, and call-to-actions for maximum engagement.

parameters.name: video_url
parameters.value: ={{ $node["Runway Advanced Video Assembly"].json.short_clip_url || $node["Runway Advanced Video Assembly"].json.preview_url }}

parameters.name: content
parameters.value:
=[{"type":"text/html","value":"

New Video Successfully Published!

Your video " + $node["Prepare Advanced Video Assembly"].json.metadata.title + " has been uploaded to YouTube and scheduled for release.

Video ID: " + $node["Prepare Social Distribution"].json.video_id + "

Scheduled Publication: " + $now.plusDays(1).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss") + "

View in YouTube Studio: Open YouTube Studio

Social media posts have been scheduled using Buffer.

Timestamp: " + $now.format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss") + "

"}]
